I pretty much like everything about this game except:

- Toxic teammates
- Teammates that never talk
- Teammates that always talk
- Teammates that tell you what to do
- Teammates that dont tell you what to do
- Russian players
- French players
- British players
- German players
...
- aaaaaaaaaaaaaand the Revolver Update. That sucked.

In conclusion: 10/10, would Rush B again.
